overview: Sperm is addictive. A new study has confirmed what we've known for a long time: the taste of sperm is addictive to whores. If you take a slut (defined as a girl who likes to have sex with at least 10 different men each month) and let her taste semen, her brain lights up in the same way as a heroin addict's. To these girls, ejaculate tastes better than chocolate. Often, the only way for these girls to cure their addiction is by swallowing so much semen in one sitting that they practically puke. Psychologists call this "negative reinforcement" - we call it a 10 Man Cum Slam!
tagline: Each Girl Swallows 10 Loads of Cum!
title: 10 Man Cum Slam 5
